programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication

programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E25, A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Texas Drifter/Fingerprints/Rose Among Thorns
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E03, From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units and watch as police use ballistics testing, old fashioned fingerprints and a new DNA data bank for criminals, to crack open the mysteries of unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E16, A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E15, Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: The Original Nightstalker
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E05, In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County. Police were unaware of the serial attacks until 1996, when DNA revealed the killer's secret and they linked four murders to a single DNA profile.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E10, Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2004, Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E19, After U.S. Navy sailor disappears in 68, the Navy claims he went AWOL. But his sister works for over 30 years to prove that he was really killed. And DNA from a cigarette butt helps detectives to unravel a 20-year-old case of rape and murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E14, A serial rapist seals his own fate when he sends a taunting letter to police. And when a man is found dead in South Dakota, his head bashed in by a 50-pound rock, investigators go on a 20-year search for the killers.

programme.title: The Burning Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E12, A detective keeps a murder investigation going for 16 years and finally proves a woman killed her husband in a satanic rite; THE BURNING SECRET: and a rape victim fails to get a conviction on her attacker.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Circle of Friends
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E07, When 18-year-old Shannon Siders' body is found in the woods, everyone in the small town of Newaygo, Michigan, becomes a suspect--but no one is convicted of the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E09, On a summer night in 1987, a 17-year-old girl to come home is found raped and strangled near the Hudson River. And In 1983, a young mother is raped and murdered at work. The crime remains unsolved for two decades.

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E15, In late 1983, the bodies of five people abducted from a local fast food restaurant are found brutally murdered. The main suspect is long believed to be a well-connected local man, until new evidence reveals the true killers.

programme.title: The Incredibly Strange Creature
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Incredibly Strange Creature, S08E19, A couple of slackers stumble across a cult of monsters at a carnival and becomes a killing zombie.
MST3K: Track Of The Moon Beast, 19990613000000 +0000, In Track of the Moon Beast (1976), a mineralogist is hit by a meteor which causes him to transform into a lizard-monster.
MST3K: Zombie Nightmare, 19941124000000 +0000, A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 2: Death Stalks The Highways
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E11, Bela Lugosi stars as Dr. Zorka, inventor of a lethal mechanical spider.

Merlin's Shop of Mystical Wonders, 19990917000000 +0000, A grandfather tells his grandson several horrifying stories involving the wizard Merlin and a stolen monkey doll in Merlin's Shop of Mystical Wonders (1996).
MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus, 19901229000000 +0000, A multinational team of astronauts heads to Venus, but finds a world destroyed by nuclear war.
MST3K: Quest Of The Delta Knights, 19980926000000 +0000, Pearl sits in on part of this week's experiment as part of her annual review, and Leonardo da Vinci stops by.
The Giant Gila Monster, 20020612000000 +0000, A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.

programme.title: The Starfighters
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Starfighters, S06E12, An Air Force pilot attempts to gain the respect of his father.

programme.title: Indestructible Man
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Indestructible Man, S04E09, In Indestructible Man, a violent criminal named Butcher Benson is executed and becomes indestructible when he’s brought back to life.

The Santa Suit, 20101202000000 +0000, Drake Hunter (Kevin Sorbo), the president of Hunter Marketing, has the perfect plan to boost sales for his father's toy company over the holiday season—hire department store Santas to promote his father's merchandise.

I'll Be Home for Christmas, 20161127000000 +0000, Jackie Foster has the perfect life until her dad Jack returns home and reluctantly agrees to spend Christmas with her and her daughter Gracie. Stars James Brolin, Mena Suvari and Giselle Eisenberg.
Finding Father Christmas, 20161113000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Christmas for Miranda is a painful reminder of the family she never had.

After the Glory, 19921129000000 +0000, A group of WWII veterans returning to their small midwestern town , find in the strong-arm tactics of local politicians, the same tyranny they went off to fight against and band together to defeat it at home.

The Beach House, 20180428000000 +0000, When Cara finds her life spinning out of control, she returns to the scenic Lowcountry to visit her mother. Before long, the rhythms of the island open her heart in wonderful ways as she repairs the family beach house.

The Courageous Heart of Irena Sendler, 20090419000000 +0000, The story of Irena Sendler, a social worker who was part of the Polish underground during World War II and was arrested by the Nazi's for saving the lives of nearly 2,500 Jewish children by smuggling them out of the Warsaw ghetto.

The Flamingo Rising, 20010204000000 +0000, An eccentric dreamer infuriates the owner of a funeral home when he decides to build the world's largest drive-in movie theater across the street. Star William Hurt, Elizabeth McGovern.

programme.title: Forest Through the Trees
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace talk about their past and the future during a camping getaway.

programme.title: The Royal Court
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. After his band's video goes viral, Trace receives offers.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E10, Hallmark Original Series. Mark offers Trace and his band a worldwide tour deal.

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. Abby returns to Maryland when she receives a phone call from her sister.

programme.title: Nemesis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E22, O'Neill is kidnapped by the Asgard and encounters a swarm of vicious metallic bug-like creatures on a mission to destroy Earth. O'Neill plans to blow up the ship and sacrifice himself, but can the team find another way to stop this apocalyptic plan?

programme.title: Small Victories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E01, SG-1 is called upon to help a race of gentle, highly-intelligent aliens struggling against a swarm of deadly mechanical spiders called Replicators. But the situation becomes much more complicated when a lone Replicator is discovered back on Earth.

programme.title: The Other Side
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E02, SG-1 responds to a cry for help from a doomed civilization, which promises to give Earthlings access to advanced technology in exchange for supplies that would help them defeat their enemies. But they soon discover that SG-1 may not be helping.

programme.title: Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E01, As Sheppard and Ronon are trapped beneath a collapsed compound, McKay and Lorne are trapped in another pocket of debris. Michael’s flagship Wraith Cruiser hurtles towards the compound, while Carter leads a rescue mission. Who will reach them first?

programme.title: The Seed
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E02, When Dr. Keller fails to report for her shift, concerned team members are shocked to discover her unconscious in her quarters. With the situation on Atlantis escalating, Woolsey is ultimately faced with a decision that could cost Keller her life.

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E03, During an off-world mission, Ronon (Jason Momoa) is ambushed and captured by his former friend, Tyre (Mark Dacascos), and turned over to the Wraith. As the team scrambles for leads to locate their friend, Ronon undergoes a torturous ordeal.

programme.title: The Daedalus Variations
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E04, A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.

programme.title: The Ghost In The Machine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E05, After a series of anomalies and power disruptions, the Atlantis team is faced with an impossible decision: to create the means to release an mysterious entity or stand by as it systematically destroys the city’s technological infrastructure.

programme.title: The Shrine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E06, On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKay’s sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.

programme.title: Whispers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E07, Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michael’s abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E08, Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.

programme.title: Light
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E05, With the Destiny still out of power, a plan is born to abandon the ship using the last working shuttle, in hopes that another planet will be habitable. But hope is short-lived when the only way to determine who will go and who will stay is a lottery.

programme.title: Water
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E06, Despite severe rationing and around-the-clock security, the water reserves onboard the Destiny continue to drop. Dr. Nicholas Rush has no explanation for this latest setback but, if they are to survive, they must find a new water source soon.

programme.title: Earth
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E07, With the situation onboard the Destiny dire, General O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and Homeworld Command order Col. Young to execute a high-risk plan concocted by the IOA scientists which, in theory, could return the crew to Earth.

programme.title: Time
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E08, After making a surprising discovery on a jungle planet, members of the team become ill. In an attempt to isolate the infection, the team sets up camp in the jungle. But when night falls, the illness will be the least of their worries.

programme.title: Upgrades
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E03, SG-1 is selected to test the effects of alien-tech wristbands on human wearers, and soon find themselves blessed with spectacular strength and speed. But when they are sent on a mission utilizing these new abilities, they learn a shocking lesson.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E04, When a High Priestess from the planet Chulak claims to have a plan that would cripple the Goa'uld, everyone is skeptical. SG-1 must join forces with the Tok'ra in order to put her plan into effect, but a deadly, hidden secret could jeopardize it.

programme.title: Lover's Leap
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E05, Valerie is haunted by nightmares about her father's suicide. David learns that his mother requires shock therapy to improve her chances of recovery. Toni throws a dinner party while her father is out of town.

programme.title: Speechless
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E06, Valerie gets herself invited on a road trip with Kelly, Donna and Clare. Steve convinces Brandon to let a director film a movie at the Walsh house. Marchette tells Toni that Dylan is using her.

programme.title: Violated
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E07, Valerie accepts her marketing professor's invitation to a seminar. Bruno delivers a letter from Dylan to Toni. Steve and Clare quarrel after booking a motel room. Donna resists Ray's relentless attempts at a reconciliation.

programme.title: Gypsies, Cramps and Fleas
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E08, A fortune teller sets up shop at the Peach Pit for Halloween. In spite of her questionable credibility, her presence has an impact on many couples.

programme.title: Earthquake Weather
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E09, Dylan asks Toni to marry him. An earthquake rocks the major Los Angeles area, spooking Colin. Donna sees her mother in a photograph of the 1969 Rose Court contestants, but Felice refuses to explain herself.

programme.title: One Wedding and a Funeral
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E10, The guys kidnap Dylan for his bachelor party. The girls throw a much wilder time for bride-to-be Toni.

programme.title: Offensive Interference
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E11, Donna makes the Rose Court, and her mother reveals her reasons for not supporting her in the pageant.

programme.title: Breast Side Up
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E12, Colin and Susan leave for New York to spend Thanksgiving with their families. The gang decides to spend the holiday together, and David invites his mother to join them.

programme.title: Courting
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E13, Joe rejects a plea bargain and decides to go to trial. The Associated Press picks up Brandon's story about the trial for nationwide syndication. Colin babysits for Erin while Kelly and David are at the trial.

programme.title: Fortunate Son
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E14, Donna fills in for Lisa at a convenience store. A young boy is caught stealing a teddy bear for his brother's birthday, but Donna covers for him. Brandon alienates Nat and Susan as he gets carried away during the After Dark's charity casino night.

programme.title: Angels We Have Heard on High
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E15, Cindy surprises Brandon by coming to visit for Christmas. Joe tries to keep an antsy Donna in suspense about her Christmas/birthday present.

programme.title: Fade In, Fade Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E17, Kelly's father swoops into town, and once again sweeps her off of her feet with promises of a relationship. Nat is reunited with an old-flame.

programme.title: Snowbound
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E18, Kelly takes refuge back with Colin, and ends up on a bender.

programme.title: Nancy's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E19, Susan is nominated for a college journalism award for her story about a girl's decision to have an abortion. Valerie arranges a meeting between Colin and a knowledgeable art buyer in the hopes of encouraging Colin to get clean and focus on his career.

programme.title: Flying
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E20, Valerie's really annoying friend Ginger returns to town. Clare and Donna confront Kelly after finding drugs in the apartment. Brandon, Steve and Joe accept Jonathan's invitation to go flying in biplanes.

programme.title: Bleeding Hearts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E21, Valerie tries to pacify Ginger by setting her up with Jonathan. Donna's sorority asks students to go without sex for 24 hours in order to promote abstinence as a means of preventing venereal diseases. Clare bets that Steve cannot make good on his pledge.

programme.title: All This and Mary Too
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E22, Colin visits Kelly and announces that he has kicked his cocaine habit. Kelly gets a roommate, a troubled teenage runaway named Tara. Valerie has the house to herself as Steve and Brandon leave for a ski weekend with Clare, Susan and David.

programme.title: Red Wind
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E09, When the hot Santa Ana winds move in from the desert, things start heating up on the Baywatch beach in more ways than one, as it seems like all the “weirdos” in the world have been blown to the beach.

programme.title: I Spike
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E10, Tracy, a lifeguard-turned-hovercraft expert, arrives at Baywatch to demonstrate the benefits of the new rescue vehicle. Meanwhile, The National Pro Beach Volleyball Tour arrives, reigniting Matt's desire to be a professional beach volleyball star.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E11, Matt and Hobie rescue a young boy who is being harassed by a thug and take care of him until they can get him to his mother, but he seems to be hiding a deep dark secret. Meanwhile, CJ falls for a handsome young man who turns out to be taboo.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E12, Joey joins Mitch and Hobie in decorating for Christmas. CJ has a great time working with Father Ryan but starts to worry that he may misinterpret her warmth as flirting, and that he may be considering quitting the priesthood for her.

programme.title: Rubber Ducky
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E13, Logan's visa is soon to expire, and he will be sent back to Australia unless he gets a green card. He plans on earning the money to purchase one in an upcoming boat race. Meanwhile Mitch’s mother visits.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E14, Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must stop the terrorist before she blows up an oil rig with Stephanie constrained inside it!

programme.title: Seize the Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E15, Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she has a terminal illness. With the team being short-staffed it is up to Logan and Caroline to deal with reckless wave runners.

programme.title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E16, Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover. Caroline resuscitates a man with AIDS, which puts a strain on her relationship with Logan. And CJ enters a ballroom dancing competition.

programme.title: Father's Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E17, Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died. Mitch and his father never saw eye-to-eye, but this gift impacts Mitch more than he ever thought possible. Logan visits a hypnotist to deal with a past trauma.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E18, Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service in order to remain on the active roster. But Andy's strong-arm tactics do not sit well with the other lifeguards.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E19, Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well. Meanwhile, Mitch must rescue a boy's brother from drug smugglers so the boy can receive a life-saving transplant of his brother's bone marrow.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E20, When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it. Mitch must help the Chinese woman find her sister. Back at headquarters, Matt and Garner deal with a beach robbery scam.

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E21, Prominent British businessman Richard Branson visits Baywatch to perform several risky stunts, putting the lifeguards on high alert. Meanwhile, Mitch has to save one of Kaye's employees whose violent husband has come looking for her.

programme.title: Wet and Wild
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E22, Hobie is thrilled when the “Johnny Danger Stunt Show" comes to the beach, but Mitch finds Johnny has questionable morals and is worried Hobie may follow his example. Matt is accused of sexual harassment by bad girl lifeguard Neely.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E01, Mitch considers a new career working with Garner as a private eye. Logan cheats on Caroline again. The explosion of an offshore oil rig endangers Stephanie, Cody, and Neely.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E02, As the crippled oil rig sinks and floods with water, Cody, Neely, and Stephanie begin a desperate rescue effort to save the two young couples, and themselves, until the Baywatch lifeguards can arrive to help.

programme.title: Hot Stuff
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E03, Kaye Morgan asks Hobie to volunteer at a school for young blind children. Things take a dangerous turn when a huge brush fire traps Hobie and the blind children in the hills, and Mitch is the only one who can save them.
